page.title: 17The Monocled Mutineer-2
page.content: Vanessa Briggs and Vicky Jenkins were filming during the day."We had to wait in the Globe archway while the priest got us ready for Sunday School.Then we walked forward in procession.Suddenly a gun went off.Soldiers started running and the priest quickly shepherded us towards the cameras." Rebecca Thick was filming in a night shot."I had to stand outside a cafe and watch the soldier sing." Anthony Taylor filmed at Parchey Bridge."I had to beg off the soldiers by saying,'Please give me biscuits and bully beef.'David Stratton also filmed at Parchey Bridge and he had to watch the soldiers play Crown & Anchor."We got Â£17:50 and the adults got Â£35:00.We had salad, caviar, meat, fruit, fruit juice and milk."
